name: Voice Comments & Reviews – Heyoya
author: Heyoya

sections.description:
Let your readers voice their opinion in a fun, fast, and easy way with Heyoya comments. Try out our free voice comments platform; it’s proven to keep readers engaged and to increase your conversions, website traffic, and improve your SEO. Voice is much more personal and direct than text and lets you interact with your readers and have conversations as you would, face-to-face.

Heyoya for WordPress

  • Increase content quality, grow brand affinity and improve the SEO of your site.
  • Keep readers on your site for longer and reduce your bounce rates with a commenting experience readers love.
  • Avoid spammers and abusive content with email authentication on every commenter.
  • Keep your readers engaged, and grow your digital community.
  • Build your site credibility and increase traffic with better user-generated content.
  • Try our AMPLIFY Premium Plan for customized comment approvals, extended recording time, advanced flagging options and more.
  • Single profile for commenting across multiple sites including social login support for Facebook, Twitter, and Google accounts
  • Bring users back to your site with web and email notifications and personalized digests

24/7 Support
Whatever you need, whenever you need it, the Voice Comments & Reviews – Heyoya team is here for you.

Moderate comments and view your analytics simply and easily.

Share comments to social media with just one click.

Heyoya on Mobile

Our AMPLIFY Premium Features

Select different configurations for different users and media.

Choose exactly how your comments are flagged.

And more…

sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 3.0 or greater
  • PHP version 5.2.0 or greater
  1. Install Heyoya Voice Reviews & Comments either via the WordPress.org plugin directory, or by uploading the files to your server
  2. After activating Heyoya Voice Reviews & Comments, go over the Comments link in the left hand side bar of your WordPress admin and click on the Heyoya entry.
  3. You will now need to register an account with Heyoya or log in with your existing account.
  4. Customize the different settings on the Heyoya Settings page.
  5. That’s it. You’re ready to go!

More documentation

Go to https://blog.heyoya.com/
sections.faq:
IMPORTANT

  • If you have a Cache Plugin, please delete all caches after Heyoya update.
I’m having difficulties logging in

We use cookies to ensure a secured log-in for you.
If you’re experiencing issues while trying to log in, please make sure your browser allows third-party cookies.

Allowing cookies on Chrome:
1. Open the Chrome browser.
2. Go to preferences and select “Settings”.
3. Under “Privacy and security”, click on “Site Settings” and then “Cookies and other site data”.
4. Check “Allow all cookies”.

Allowing cookies on Safari:
1. Open the Safari browser.
2. Go to preferences and select “Privacy”.
3. Uncheck the following fields:
* Prevent cross-site tracking.
* Block all cookies.

Allowing cookies on Firefox:
1. Open the Firefox browser.
2. Go to the “Privacy & Security” section (about:preferences#privacy)
3. Select Custom.
4. Unmark the “Cookies” checkbox.

Your browser is not listed? Contact us at support at heyoya.com, and we’ll be happy to offer further assistance.

Comments – Does Heyoya limits the number of comments?

The Voice Comments & Reviews – Heyoya plugin does not limit to the number of comments that can be posted or played on your site.

Comments – Heyoya Languages

The Voice Comments & Reviews – Heyoya widget supports 23 languages:
* English
* Deutsch
* français
* Español
* Português
* Português(brasil)
* русский
* عربىs
* Türk
* हिंदी
* български
* Română
* Ελληνικά
* فارسی
* italiano
* Nederlands
* 中文
* 日本語
* 한국어
* svenska
* עִברִית
* українська
* Polski

Change your widget language by accessing Comments > Heyoya

Does this plugin fully replace the current comment system?

Yes! Voice Comments & Reviews – Heyoya changes the default comment system to a new interactive system.

Would the plugin help me to increase my user retention?

Voice Comments & Reviews – Heyoya allows commentators to record short voice posts. Voice comments are easier than typed text for most web users, and there is an element of fun to voice recording that also promotes user engagement. The ease of posting, and the higher engagement rates, will lead naturally to improved user retention, as site visitors who leave comments – in voice or any other format – will naturally be inclined to return and revisit their comments to see responses and follow up. In this way, Voice Comments & Reviews – Heyoya voice comments will lead to a natural conversation on the website, keeping your visitors on the site longer, and improving your retention and conversion rates.

Can I import my existing WordPress comments into Heyoya?

Yes, you can import your existing WordPress comments into Voice Comments & Reviews – Heyoya during installation.

Go to: Comments > Heyoya > Advanced > Import Comments

How Heyoya associate comments with my website pages

The Voice Comments & Reviews – Heyoya plugin is a URL based solution; this means that a comment is associated with the page URL it was posted at.

How to cancel my subscription

Canceling a subscription is an easy and no-questions-asked process.
Just send an email to support at heyoya.com with the subject line: Canceling Heyoya, and we will get right to work.

Got more questions?

Our support team is available 24/7 and will get back to you about any questions you might have. You can also contact them by email at support at heyoya.com.
